column3: Would suggest adding `if (getenv("QT_QPA_PLATFORM") == nullptr)` so the new instructions for setting `QT_QPA_PLATFORM` work on windows. Or, if you'd prefer to not change behavior in a documentation-only PR, you could add a `// TODO: Fix this to not overwrite QT_QPA_PLATFORM if it is set externally` comment
Thx, added a commit and changed the pull request type to "qa"
